LABEL: 0x31F
STRING: In the dead silence...

LABEL: 0x343
STRING: No one could speak up.

LABEL: 0x363
STRING: No one knew.

LABEL: 0x383
STRING: That was all...

LABEL: 0x39D
STRING: Our emotions melted into the surrounding air.

LABEL: 0x3C3
STRING: The feeling was like that of loneliness...

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: 「More importantly...」

LABEL: 0x427
STRING: It was Yukari herself who cut the silence.

LABEL: 0x524
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, are you hurt?」

LABEL: 0x558
STRING: 「After all, you've been through so much...」

LABEL: 0x5A5
STRING: 「I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x61E
STRING: 「I'm... fine.」

LABEL: 0x64B
STRING: I wondered about that...

LABEL: 0x66B
STRING: ――It was no use.

LABEL: 0x685
STRING: Given the situation, it felt like there was more to every word than met the eye.

LABEL: 0x6CF
STRING: I sighed to myself.

LABEL: 0x70C
STRING: 「Why don't you have Hiragino-sensei take a look at you?」

LABEL: 0x74C
STRING: 「There's always a chance.」

LABEL: 0x78D
STRING: 「...You have a point there.」

LABEL: 0x7C6
STRING: 「Then, please do.」

LABEL: 0x7F3
STRING: 「――That said, at a glance it doesn't look like you're hurt anywhere.」

LABEL: 0x90D
STRING: Hiragino pulled back the hem of her kimono as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x945
STRING: He peered between the cloth with sharp eyes.

LABEL: 0x9A1
STRING: ...Wait, hey!

LABEL: 0x9CB
STRING: What are you doing, old man?

LABEL: 0x9F3
STRING: You're too old to stare at a teenage girl's bare skin like that.

LABEL: 0xA59
STRING: Tokiwa, on the other hand, stood stock-still, her face unchanging as she watched him do his thing.

LABEL: 0xAA5
STRING: Her pale skin peeked out from between her kimono.

LABEL: 0xAC9
STRING: Yukari and I, who were just bystanders, were more bothered by it than her.

LABEL: 0xB03
STRING: Well, more accurately, it was mostly Yukari, but...

LABEL: 0xB31
STRING: Was it just me, or did Hiragino click his tongue softly every time he rolled up her kimono?

LABEL: 0xB98
STRING: 「...Is everything okay?」

LABEL: 0xBC1
STRING: Yukari finally called out to him.

LABEL: 0xBE5
STRING: He raised his head and answered without a hint of guilt.

LABEL: 0xD03
STRING: 「Yeah. At the very least, she doesn't have any injuries.」

LABEL: 0xD2F
STRING: 「It's true that he wasn't rough with her.」

LABEL: 0xDD3
STRING: 「...That's not what I meant.」

LABEL: 0xE4C
STRING: 「I was asking if you were okay, sensei.」

LABEL: 0xF21
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0xF37
STRING: 「You don't look fine at all.」

LABEL: 0xF6E
STRING: 「Yukari's right.」

LABEL: 0xF92
STRING: 「You look even worse than before...」

LABEL: 0xFC8
STRING: 「Are you sure you're okay?」

LABEL: 0xFEC
STRING: That was right.

LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: He looked even worse than usual.

LABEL: 0x103C
STRING: He had a frown on his face, and his back was hunched.

LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: I was doubtful if he was even able to make normal judgments at the moment...

LABEL: 0x10B4
STRING: However, Hiragino merely waved his hand and put it in his chest pocket.

LABEL: 0x116A
STRING: 「No, it's not that bad.」

LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: 「My body just feels heavy and sluggish... It's probably from that smoke earlier.」

LABEL: 0x11DF
STRING: Right, the soporific smoke.

LABEL: 0x1205
STRING: It was probably the same stuff that I had inhaled...

LABEL: 0x123B
STRING: However, I was now almost back to my usual self.

LABEL: 0x1283
STRING: Just how much did he inhale to become like that...?

LABEL: 0x1307
STRING: He took a xylitol tablet out of his chest pocket and stuffed it into his mouth.

LABEL: 0x13B5
STRING: 「Okay, I'm awake now.」

LABEL: 0x13DD
STRING: 「There's no need to worry.」

LABEL: 0x1404
STRING: Hiragino looked even more in pain as he tried to put on a smile.

LABEL: 0x143A
STRING: Yukari told him to be considerate of his own health, but this was just how he was.

LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: She glared at him resentfully.

LABEL: 0x14B4
STRING: ...But eventually, she let out a small sigh.

LABEL: 0x15AF
STRING: 「Please be careful.」

LABEL: 0x15D5
STRING: 「If you get tired, please let me know.」

LABEL: 0x1679
STRING: 「I know, I know.」

LABEL: 0x1699
STRING: 「Something like this doesn't phase me at all.」

LABEL: 0x1726
STRING: 「Well, it does, but... There's something more important.」

LABEL: 0x1771
STRING: 「Which would be...?」

LABEL: 0x17FB
STRING: 「I now know what happened to Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x1833
STRING: 「Could you tell me your story next?」

LABEL: 0x1869
STRING: 「...Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x188C
STRING: 「Me?」

LABEL: 0x18A6
STRING: I couldn't help but ask.

LABEL: 0x18DB
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x18F6
STRING: Hiragino nodded immediately.

LABEL: 0x1918
STRING: Why only me...? Yukari was there too.

LABEL: 0x19A0
STRING: Why was Hiragino trying to make me talk and not her?

LABEL: 0x19E2
STRING: His determination was apparent in his dizzy and unsteady eyes.

LABEL: 0x1A44
STRING: 「...Sure.」

LABEL: 0x1ABF
STRING: And so, I began to talk.

LABEL: 0x1AE5
STRING: About what had happened after we'd parted ways in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x1B23
STRING: How we'd been drugged and nearly attacked by someone.

LABEL: 0x1B5B
STRING: How I had hid with Yukari.

LABEL: 0x1B83
STRING: About the humanoid light mass,

LABEL: 0x1BA3
STRING: Tokiwa,

LABEL: 0x1BB9
STRING: and about Reiri's last moments...

LABEL: 0x1D1E
STRING: After listening to the whole story, Hiragino was thinking in silence.

LABEL: 0x1D9C
STRING: Yukari hadn't said a word while I was talking.

LABEL: 0x1DDC
STRING: And, even after I finished, she didn't say anything.

LABEL: 0x1E0A
STRING: Not a word.

LABEL: 0x1E1E
STRING: Eventually, Hiragino slowly opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x1EB6
STRING: 「Putting your stories together, there are still things I don't understand.」

LABEL: 0x1EF6
STRING: 「What happened with the rescue team in the end?」

LABEL: 0x1F2B
STRING: That was the same question I had.

LABEL: 0x1F5B
STRING: The rescue team that should have come for us.

LABEL: 0x1F7B
STRING: We still hadn't seen them.

LABEL: 0x1F9D
STRING: At the very least, I hadn't.

LABEL: 0x1FC9
STRING: Nothing I could describe as a "rescue team," in any case.

LABEL: 0x2071
STRING: 「...The rescue team did come.」

LABEL: 0x2099
STRING: 「You went into that ship yourself, sensei.」

LABEL: 0x20C5
STRING: 「It's definitely from ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x20FC
STRING: Yukari spoke quietly, but in a resolute tone.

LABEL: 0x213C
STRING: Hiragino nodded at her words.

LABEL: 0x217B
STRING: 「...The rescue team...」

LABEL: 0x21A3
STRING: 「You mean the man who took Tokiwa-kun with him and spread the soporific smoke all over the ship?」

LABEL: 0x225F
STRING: 「Well――」

LABEL: 0x2295
STRING: 「...I'm not sure.」

LABEL: 0x22B7
STRING: 「At this stage, it's hard to say...」

LABEL: 0x234F
STRING: 「――Don't play dumb, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x23FC
STRING: It was sudden.

LABEL: 0x241C
STRING: Hiragino raised his voice.

LABEL: 0x243A
STRING: Yukari looked surprised as well, but hid it a moment later.

LABEL: 0x248F
STRING: 「What do you mean, "Don't play dumb?"」

LABEL: 0x24DA
STRING: 「If that man wasn't part of the rescue team...」

LABEL: 0x2512
STRING: 「...Just who was he then?」

LABEL: 0x2543
STRING: Despite her resistance, Hiragino didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x25E3
STRING: 「Let's say he didn't come aboard that rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x262F
STRING: 「Then where was that man hiding until now on the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x2682
STRING: 「Where did the rescue team that should be here go?」

LABEL: 0x2711
STRING: 「Can you explain any of these things?」

LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: He scratched his head as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x276E
STRING: Even an outsider could tell he was irritated.

LABEL: 0x279C
STRING: It felt like he was angry with how vague Yukari was acting,

LABEL: 0x27D8
STRING: but his physical condition was holding him back.

LABEL: 0x287E
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, Tokiwa-kun, what do you think?」

LABEL: 0x28AE
STRING: 「To put it bluntly...」

LABEL: 0x28D2
STRING: 「I don't think ROMLES has any intention of rescuing us.」

LABEL: 0x2915
STRING: 「Hey! Hiragino-san, that's going too far.」

LABEL: 0x2945
STRING: That had been his line up until now, hadn't it?

LABEL: 0x297B
STRING: "You're going too far."

LABEL: 0x2995
STRING: Calm down.

LABEL: 0x29AF
STRING: His voice and breathing were ragged.

LABEL: 0x29D9
STRING: Whether it was due to excitement, anger,

LABEL: 0x29F7
STRING: bewilderment or impatience, I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x2A4D
STRING: Unable to hide his pained expression, Hiragino fell to the floor.

LABEL: 0x2AA5
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, he was... at his limit.

LABEL: 0x2ACD
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa froze in place, and I...

LABEL: 0x2AF7
STRING: I couldn't even reach a hand out to him while he was struggling by himself.

LABEL: 0x2B3F
STRING: Yukari just watched as he did his best to appeal to her in pain.

LABEL: 0x2B87
STRING: With pitying eyes.

LABEL: 0x2BA7
STRING: Caressing eyes.

LABEL: 0x2BC9
STRING: Expressionless... No, she was gritting her teeth.

LABEL: 0x2BF9
STRING: Eventually, she averted her eyes.

LABEL: 0x2C8B
STRING: 「I understand what you're saying, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x2D1E
STRING: 「But... Let me say one thing.」

LABEL: 0x2D4E
STRING: 「We can't leave the <SHEEP III> without help from ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x2D9D
STRING: 「It's up to you to doubt me, but please don't interfere with our only way out of here.」

LABEL: 0x2E23
STRING: She tried her best to sound calm and emotionless like usual.

LABEL: 0x2E5F
STRING: There was no response from Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x2EEB
STRING: 「...If it's true that ROMLES won't come to our rescue...」

LABEL: 0x2F35
STRING: 「It's because they can't...」

LABEL: 0x2F5F
STRING: 「...Or that they've decided not to save us.」

LABEL: 0x2FA2
STRING: ...Decided not to save us?

LABEL: 0x2FCC
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x2FF4
STRING: I asked her reflexively.

LABEL: 0x3012
STRING: On what basis would anyone make a decision like that?

LABEL: 0x3056
STRING: If they wouldn't save us... it was the same as abandoning us.

LABEL: 0x30A6
STRING: How could such a decision be made without our knowledge?

LABEL: 0x30F2
STRING: Yukari glanced at me.

LABEL: 0x31E1
STRING: 「I believe in their decision.」

LABEL: 0x3211
STRING: 「No matter what ROMLES decides, I'll follow them as the chief attendant.」

LABEL: 0x3263
STRING: 「Because that will be the best choice.」

LABEL: 0x32FB
STRING: 「...Damn dog.」

LABEL: 0x3324
STRING: 「Isn't it better to be self-aware?」

LABEL: 0x3353
STRING: Yukari snapped back without a moment's pause.

LABEL: 0x3377
STRING: Her annoyed and defiant tone echoed inside the room.

LABEL: 0x33CA
STRING: 「Now then――」

LABEL: 0x33E4
STRING: 「There's no point in talking about this forever.」

LABEL: 0x3461
STRING: After spitting the words out, Yukari slowly turned around and headed for the hallway.

LABEL: 0x349F
STRING: 「Yukari-san――」

LABEL: 0x3527
STRING: 「I'll return to the wheelhouse for now.」

LABEL: 0x3553
STRING: 「We need to restore the power.」

LABEL: 0x3579
STRING: 「...And, we might be able to make contact again.」

LABEL: 0x367B
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x3703
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x3728
STRING: 「I'd like you to come with me. Is that all right?」

LABEL: 0x3773
STRING: 「Hmm.」

LABEL: 0x3789
STRING: 「As long as you're fine with having me.」

LABEL: 0x37B6
STRING: Tokiwa replied without much apparent thought behind her words.

LABEL: 0x380D
STRING: 「Please wait here, you two.」

LABEL: 0x383F
STRING: 「There's Touri-san as well... Don't move from here on your own.」

LABEL: 0x38BE
STRING: With that warning, the two of them left the crew room.

LABEL: 0x3915
STRING: Left behind were me and Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x3943
STRING: And Touri, who was sleeping behind us.

LABEL: 0x39AB
STRING: Just the two of us, huh?

LABEL: 0x39C9
STRING: I didn't feel particularly awkward, but I didn't have the energy to talk either.

LABEL: 0x3A05
STRING: Hiragino was hanging his head.

LABEL: 0x3A33
STRING: He didn't seem to be feeling well after all, but I was grateful that he didn't pay me any mind.

LABEL: 0x3A93
STRING: I let out a small sigh so he wouldn't notice.

LABEL: 0x3B2C
STRING: ...How did we end up in this situation?

LABEL: 0x3B6E
STRING: The rescue team came here. We were going to be saved soon.

LABEL: 0x3B9A
STRING: There was no trace of that hope left now.

LABEL: 0x3BC4
STRING: On the contrary, how could we, the survivors who were getting along well until today,

LABEL: 0x3C06
STRING: become so divided?

LABEL: 0x3C40
STRING: Were you saying that it was wrong to be blinded by uncertain hope?

LABEL: 0x3C8C
STRING: Where did it all go wrong?

LABEL: 0x3CAA
STRING: Who made a mistake?

LABEL: 0x3CC6
STRING: And how could we take it back――

LABEL: 0x3D07
STRING: 「Oh, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x3D89
STRING: A voice rose from the back of the room.

LABEL: 0x3DAF
STRING: As I turned around, the owner of the voice greeted me with a yawn while rubbing her eyes.

LABEL: 0x3E13
STRING: 「Touri... You're awake?」

LABEL: 0x3EA3
STRING: 「Good mo-hoorning――!」

LABEL: 0x3EC4
STRING: Was that unusual cry supposed to be a greeting?

LABEL: 0x3F5A
STRING: 「I think I fell asleep.」

LABEL: 0x3F86
STRING: 「I might've been too tired...」

LABEL: 0x3FB1
STRING: It was just before 22:00.... You tended to lose your sense of time inside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x4000
STRING: Even though it was because of the smoke, she was probably able to get rid of some of her fatigue by sleeping.

LABEL: 0x40B2
STRING: 「Well, since it's this dark, it couldn't be helped, right?」

LABEL: 0x40EF
STRING: 「I don't know about that...」

LABEL: 0x4113
STRING: She tilted her head like she didn't understand what I said.

LABEL: 0x4161
STRING: ...This was Touri, alright.

LABEL: 0x4181
STRING: Nothing had changed about her.

LABEL: 0x419F
STRING: It was only natural, but I felt it was something to be happy about.

LABEL: 0x426D
STRING: 「Is this another blackout?」

LABEL: 0x429A
STRING: Touri finally seemed to notice.

LABEL: 0x42CA
STRING: Why was her unchanging demeanor so soothing?

LABEL: 0x4318
STRING: 「Y-Yeah. Yukari went to the wheelhouse just now to restore it.」

LABEL: 0x43CC
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x4443
STRING: 「...Hehe.」

LABEL: 0x4464
STRING: Suddenly, Touri giggled as if she couldn't hold it in anymore.

LABEL: 0x449C
STRING: Did I say something funny?

LABEL: 0x452E
STRING: 「No, um...」

LABEL: 0x454C
STRING: 「It's kind of funny how we're at the bottom of the sea, but we're afraid of a power cut.」

LABEL: 0x45A7
STRING: 「Uh-huh...」

LABEL: 0x4631
STRING: 「It's no different from being on the surface, right?」

LABEL: 0x4666
STRING: It was precisely because we were at the bottom of the sea that it was scary...

LABEL: 0x46B4
STRING: However, it would be rude of me to correct her like that.

LABEL: 0x46E2
STRING: It had been a while since I'd seen a smiling face.

LABEL: 0x4702
STRING: Someone at ease.

LABEL: 0x471A
STRING: Or, someone relaxed.

LABEL: 0x4734
STRING: I would end up relaxing as well at this rate.

LABEL: 0x4752
STRING: That's why I couldn't stand it.

LABEL: 0x47E6
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x480B
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x4834
STRING: 「Where's Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x4D84
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x4E69
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4E7F
STRING: 「O-Oh, Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x4EA1
STRING: 「...She said she was going somewhere for a bit and left.」

LABEL: 0x4EED
STRING: An immediate lie.

LABEL: 0x4F13
STRING: I lied straight to her face.

LABEL: 0x4F31
STRING: I had no choice but to.

LABEL: 0x4F55
STRING: Because, she was still smiling――

LABEL: 0x4F8A
STRING: 「Somewhere...?」

LABEL: 0x4FAF
STRING: Touri cocked her head slightly as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x4FF0
STRING: 「Could this blackout be because of her?」

LABEL: 0x5081
STRING: 「Is she doing something weird again?」

LABEL: 0x50BA
STRING: 「Ah, no...」

LABEL: 0x50E7
STRING: 「She's always causing trouble for others. Really, that girl...」

LABEL: 0x5136
STRING: 「――You're wrong.」

LABEL: 0x516F
STRING: Words of denial.

LABEL: 0x518B
STRING: Hiragino, who had been slumped over the desk in the darkness, had raised his head at some point and was looking at Touri.

LABEL: 0x52B2
STRING: 「Ah, you were here too, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x533D
STRING: 「...Wait, you look pale. Are you alright?」

LABEL: 0x53E1
STRING: 「Don't worry about me...」

LABEL: 0x540A
STRING: Hiragino desperately tried to find his words, but he still didn't seem to have his composure back.

LABEL: 0x5444
STRING: ――Suddenly, I felt uneasy.

LABEL: 0x546C
STRING: What was he going to say to her?

LABEL: 0x54B3
STRING: 「This isn't Reiri-kun's doing.」

LABEL: 0x54F0
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x556B
STRING: 「What am I wrong about?」

LABEL: 0x5599
STRING: 「Do you know where she is?」

LABEL: 0x55DE
STRING: Hiragino nodded in response to Touri's question.

LABEL: 0x5611
STRING: 「Reiri-kun is―」

LABEL: 0x566E
STRING: ――Stop.

LABEL: 0x5688
STRING: Stop it.

LABEL: 0x56A2
STRING: Please, don't take away her smile.

LABEL: 0x56D6
STRING: I recalled the deranged state Touri had been in when we'd first found Reiri on the first day.

LABEL: 0x5724
STRING: The way she had lost her liveliness and smile was like a nightmare to me.

LABEL: 0x5776
STRING: I didn't want to make her go through that again.

LABEL: 0x57AA
STRING: Even if it was something she'd have to learn sooner or later,

LABEL: 0x57E4
STRING: just for now――

LABEL: 0x58CB
STRING: 「Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x596D
STRING: 「...Reiri-kun said she was going to go investigate something.」

LABEL: 0x59BC
STRING: He smiled his usual gentle smile as he told her that.

LABEL: 0x5A66
STRING: 「So, she's investigating something, huh...?」

LABEL: 0x5A82
STRING: 「She really can't sit still, can she?」

LABEL: 0x5AB6
STRING: 「She could have at least stayed with me since the power is out...」

LABEL: 0x5B53
STRING: 「Don't you think so too, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x5B9C
STRING: It was an innocent question from a girl who knew nothing.

LABEL: 0x5BCE
STRING: I looked up at her face in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x5BF6
STRING: Her eyes were clear.

LABEL: 0x5C5E
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x5C78
STRING: I couldn't say anything.

LABEL: 0x5C94
STRING: No matter what I said, I'd be lying.

LABEL: 0x5D15
STRING: Reiri――

LABEL: 0x5D2B
STRING: Why did she have to die?

LABEL: 0x5D5B
STRING: Why didn't she resist?

LABEL: 0x5D83
STRING: What should I say to her sister, who was left behind?

LABEL: 0x5DBF
STRING: I couldn't breathe well.

LABEL: 0x5DE1
STRING: My chest tightened.

LABEL: 0x5E03
STRING: It hurt.

LABEL: 0x5E19
STRING: It was painful, but it couldn't compare to the pain Touri was about to experience.

LABEL: 0x5E61
STRING: There would be no end to Reiri's investigation.

LABEL: 0x5E8F
STRING: She wouldn't be coming back to us――

LABEL: 0x5F24
STRING: ――Ah.

LABEL: 0x5F3E
STRING: I suddenly remembered that Reiri had holed herself up in the laboratory yesterday... She said she was going to investigate something there, if I recalled correctly.

LABEL: 0x5FA0
STRING: There was only so much she could find out in just two hours, no matter how smart she was.

LABEL: 0x5FFF
STRING: So――

LABEL: 0x6015
STRING: During that blank time period...

LABEL: 0x6033
STRING: What was Reiri doing in the lab?

LABEL: 0x60CD
STRING: 「But, well...」

LABEL: 0x614A
STRING: 「It's fine as long as she's safe.」

LABEL: 0x6176
STRING: 「I thought she would stay with me the whole time.」

LABEL: 0x61B6
STRING: 「While I was talking to Reiri in here, I suddenly felt sleepy.」

LABEL: 0x6208
STRING: 「I wasn't sleepy at all before that, but as soon as I closed my eyes for a second, I fell asleep.」

LABEL: 0x62C7
STRING: 「I'm a failure of an older sister, I am.」

LABEL: 0x62EE
STRING: ...She suddenly got sleepy, huh?

LABEL: 0x6314
STRING: Touri herself didn't seem to find it suspicious, but it had no doubt been the soporific smoke.

LABEL: 0x6366
STRING: However, she hadn't seen the culprit, either...

LABEL: 0x63EC
STRING: She let out a sharp yelp and stretched.

LABEL: 0x641E
STRING: Was she getting sleepy again...?

LABEL: 0x644E
STRING: Still, she made me feel at peace.

LABEL: 0x64E8
STRING: 「I'm starting to get hungry.」

LABEL: 0x651F
STRING: 「In that case...」

LABEL: 0x653F
STRING: Come to think of it, I hadn't eaten anything this morning.

LABEL: 0x6579
STRING: Lunch, too... After all that had happened, I'd forgotten to eat completely.

LABEL: 0x65C1
STRING: I couldn't believe I was even thinking about eating right now.

LABEL: 0x660B
STRING: I might be having a pretty hard time of it myself...

LABEL: 0x6643
STRING: That said, I didn't have much of an appetite at the moment.

LABEL: 0x6679
STRING: But it might be a good idea to eat at least something in case something happened.

LABEL: 0x6733
STRING: 「Wanna go get food from downstairs again?」

LABEL: 0x6770
STRING: 「Hold on, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x67A1
STRING: Hiragino stopped Touri from putting her hand on the door.

LABEL: 0x67E3
STRING: Right, Yukari had told us not to leave this room for now.

LABEL: 0x6900
STRING: 「Let's save it for when Yukari-san and the others come back.」

LABEL: 0x6932
STRING: 「It's not good to act on our own.」

LABEL: 0x6977
STRING: 「She's in the wheelhouse, right?」

LABEL: 0x69B0
STRING: 「Yes, with Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x69D6
STRING: 「They didn't go there just to fix the power outage. They're also trying to contact the surface, so it might take a while.」

LABEL: 0x6AA2
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x6ABE
STRING: 「Will the transmission work properly?」

LABEL: 0x6B5E
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x6B7F
STRING: We wouldn't know until we tried.

LABEL: 0x6BAB
STRING: However, if there was no problem with the equipment, it wouldn't be strange for it to connect again.

LABEL: 0x6C0B
STRING: The noise we heard before might just have been signal interference on their end.

LABEL: 0x6C5F
STRING: I didn't want to be too pessimistic, but...

LABEL: 0x6D11
STRING: 「Well, you should eat this.」

LABEL: 0x6D3D
STRING: 「Here, hold out your hand.」

LABEL: 0x6D64
STRING: Hiragino took Touri's hand and rolled a few xylitol tablets to her open palm.

LABEL: 0x6E2A
STRING: 「Thanks!」

LABEL: 0x6E48
STRING: 「I'll feel like a new person after eating these!」

LABEL: 0x6E7D
STRING: 「Here, you too, Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x6EA4
STRING: 「S-Sure.」

LABEL: 0x6EBE
STRING: I accepted a couple tablets as well at his urging.

LABEL: 0x6F3B
STRING: 「Ahnnn!」

LABEL: 0x6F5A
STRING: Following Touri's lead, I popped one into my mouth.

LABEL: 0x6F8E
STRING: The mint was more powerful than I expected, and it felt like my mind was clearing up.

LABEL: 0x6FD2
STRING: This is good.

LABEL: 0x6FEC
STRING: It made sense why he liked to chew these all the time.

LABEL: 0x7024
STRING: I crushed the tablet with my back teeth.

LABEL: 0x7050
STRING: The first layer of mint――

LABEL: 0x70FF
STRING: 「Whoaahh!!」

LABEL: 0x7189
STRING: 「What's wrong, Katagiri-san!?」

LABEL: 0x71B6
STRING: ――It's painful!

LABEL: 0x71E8
STRING: No, that wasn't it...

LABEL: 0x7202
STRING: It hurts!

LABEL: 0x7216
STRING: My tongue, my teeth, my mouth...

LABEL: 0x723A
STRING: The intense composition of the mint was spreading through my whole mouth and into my nose.

LABEL: 0x727C
STRING: 「Aieeggh!」

LABEL: 0x729E
STRING: M-My nose...

LABEL: 0x72BA
STRING: It hurt so much I was tearing up...

LABEL: 0x72E4
STRING: This is pathetic...

LABEL: 0x7374
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san, what's gotten into you all of a sudden?」

LABEL: 0x7403
STRING: 「Did you bite your tongue?」

LABEL: 0x7421
STRING: 「When you bite your tongue, umm...

LABEL: 0x74F5
STRING: Aloe!」

LABEL: 0x7517
STRING: Touri was worried about me as I let out a strange cry without any warning.

LABEL: 0x7555
STRING: I hadn't bitten my tongue.

LABEL: 0x7579
STRING: Or so I tried to say, but every time I breathed in, the fiendish mint stimulated my nostrils, making it hard to speak properly.

LABEL: 0x75E9
STRING: I waved my hands frantically.

LABEL: 0x760F
STRING: Touri looked almost frightened.

LABEL: 0x7631
STRING: Quickly... I had to tell her...

LABEL: 0x7661
STRING: 「Gh... Touri...」

LABEL: 0x76ED
STRING: 「It's okay, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x7716
STRING: 「The mint...」

LABEL: 0x7734
STRING: 「It's too deadly...」

LABEL: 0x7760
STRING: 「Make sure to not bite it...」

LABEL: 0x778E
STRING: 「No matter what...」

LABEL: 0x7901
STRING: 「...Hweeeh?!」

LABEL: 0x791F
STRING: 「Why didn't you say so...」

LABEL: 0x799E
STRING: 「It's so strong!」

LABEL: 0x79BF
STRING: Aw, man...

LABEL: 0x79D7
STRING: Touri burst into tears.

LABEL: 0x7A0D
STRING: However, that pain was still just the beginning.

LABEL: 0x7A3B
STRING: The tablet grew more powerful as it absorbed saliva.

LABEL: 0x7A73
STRING: She covered her mouth with both hands and scanned around the room.

LABEL: 0x7AA9
STRING: She was visibly shaken.

LABEL: 0x7ACF
STRING: Writhing in agony.

LABEL: 0x7AEB
STRING: Tears welled up in her eyes...

LABEL: 0x7B25
STRING: Feels nice, huh?

LABEL: 0x7B3F
STRING: It wasn't the feeling of your head clearing up or anything like that. It was just pain.

LABEL: 0x7B7D
STRING: Hiragino stared at us curiously as we made a huge fuss.

LABEL: 0x7BBD
STRING: This guy――

LABEL: 0x7BDF
STRING: I thought he was my only comrade with a decent sense of taste.

LABEL: 0x7C23
STRING: I felt betrayed.

LABEL: 0x7CCF
STRING: 「In any case――」

LABEL: 0x7CEB
STRING: 「The food problem... is a problem.」

LABEL: 0x7D1A
STRING: I wondered if his stupid statement was a sign of his recovering health.

LABEL: 0x7DB8
STRING: 「Now that there are doubts about our chances of being rescued...」

LABEL: 0x7DEE
STRING: 「We might still have to stay here for a while.」

LABEL: 0x7E30
STRING: 「Any food will be valuable...」

LABEL: 0x7E61
STRING: 「You're right...」

LABEL: 0x7E7D
STRING: We weren't sure of our chances of getting rescued.

LABEL: 0x7EAB
STRING: How long would we still be staying here?

LABEL: 0x7ED7
STRING: I didn't know what the future held for us, but the naive assumption that we'd be able to go home soon was a thing of the past.

LABEL: 0x7F33
STRING: Not just the food, but any materials left inside the <SHEEP III> should be handled with care.

LABEL: 0x7FFA
STRING: 「That said, there are the IVs and nutritional supplements, too.」

LABEL: 0x8051
STRING: 「They have something like that on this ship as well?」

LABEL: 0x8085
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, they were way too well prepared.

LABEL: 0x8125
STRING: 「Yeah, the emergency room is pretty packed.」

LABEL: 0x8157
STRING: 「Even if we're still on planet Earth, this is the deep sea. It's not a place people normally live in.」

LABEL: 0x81A3
STRING: 「So everything was prepared, just in case.」

LABEL: 0x81E2
STRING: 「What about operating tools?」

LABEL: 0x8286
STRING: Check.」

LABEL: 0x82A1
STRING: 「Blood for transfusion?」

LABEL: 0x833B
STRING: Check.」

LABEL: 0x8356
STRING: 「Picture books for reading...?」

LABEL: 0x8412
STRING: Check.」

LABEL: 0x842D
STRING: 「Seriously...?」

LABEL: 0x844B
STRING: That reminded me, Hiragino had used a small MRI device after Reiri's rescue operation.

LABEL: 0x848C
STRING: I didn't think it was good to be this fully equipped, and if it were under normal circumstances, I'd be appalled.

LABEL: 0x84DE
STRING: But, I couldn't really say anything because they'd been of use to us...

LABEL: 0x859C
STRING: 「Well, let me know if you need anything.」

LABEL: 0x85CA
STRING: 「It's a little late for me to say this, but there's almost everything you could hope for.」

LABEL: 0x8605
STRING: 「Well, I hope we'll have no need for any of them...」

LABEL: 0x8657
STRING: Our pointless conversation came to an end...

LABEL: 0x8681
STRING: I was feeling bored now.

LABEL: 0x86AB
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa hadn't come back yet.

LABEL: 0x86D7
STRING: The power outage was still going, so it looked like it was a lot of work to restore it.

LABEL: 0x87E2
STRING: 「Hey, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x8802
STRING: 「Can we go check what's going on outside?」

LABEL: 0x8839
STRING: 「Sorry, we can't.」

LABEL: 0x88BC
STRING: 「Wait just a little longer.」

LABEL: 0x8956
STRING: 「Okay‾...」

LABEL: 0x8977
STRING: Or so she said, but she looked undeterred.

LABEL: 0x89B7
STRING: I could tell from her attitude that she was bored.

LABEL: 0x89E9
STRING: If she went outside, she'd be able to have fun.

LABEL: 0x8A1B
STRING: She still had what we'd already lost.

LABEL: 0x8A6B
STRING: She had her innocence only because she didn't know what had happened.

LABEL: 0x8A9F
STRING: She was able to remain ignorant.

LABEL: 0x8AFF
STRING: ――That might be a happy thing.

LABEL: 0x8C0E
STRING: 「But, there's nothing to do!」

LABEL: 0x8C35
STRING: 「Let's talk about something interesting.」

LABEL: 0x8C68
STRING: 「Like what...?」

LABEL: 0x8C84
STRING: What would be an interesting topic?

LABEL: 0x8CA6
STRING: What was trending among high school girls these days?

LABEL: 0x8CD4
STRING: Was it still true that men who could tell funny stories were popular?

LABEL: 0x8D1E
STRING: Touri clapped her hands together beside me as I was lost in thought.

LABEL: 0x8DC4
STRING: 「Right!」

LABEL: 0x8DFD
STRING: She turned around and pulled out a flashlight.

LABEL: 0x8E29
STRING: Touri held it with both hands, illuminating her face from below.

LABEL: 0x8ECD
STRING: 「Waah!」

LABEL: 0x8F04
STRING: ...Was this interesting?
